summary:
### **Summary of ASX Announcement: Driver Australia Ten (Asset-Backed Securities)**  

#### **Key Transaction Details**  
- **Issuer**: Perpetual Corporate Trust Limited (Trustee of Driver Australia Ten Trust)  
- **Underlying Assets**: Auto loans (New/Used cars) originated by Volkswagen Financial Services Australia  
- **Total Outstanding Receivables (Pool Cut Date)**: **AUD 750.02M** (New: 78.29%, Used: 21.71%)  
- **Product Mix**: Chattel Mortgage (76.50%), Consumer Loan (23.50%)  
- **Initial Ratings**:  
  - **Class A Notes**: AAA(sf) / Aaa(sf) (S&P/Moody’s)  
  - **Class B Notes**: Aa2(sf) (Moody’s)  

#### **Performance Metrics (May 2025)**  
- **Outstanding Receivables**: **AUD 569.24M** (down from AUD 592.90M previous month)  
- **Arrears >30 Days**: **7.67%** of balance (1,332 contracts)  
- **Net Losses (Cumulative)**: **AUD 183.5K** (0.0245% of initial pool)  
- **Prepayment Rate (Annualized CPR)**: **14.22%** (up from 13.06% last month)  

#### **Credit Enhancement**  
- **Class A Notes**:  
  - **Overcollateralization**: **18.68%** (up from 12.30% at issuance)  
  - **Cash Collateral Account**: AUD 9.0M (1.20% of pool)  
- **Trigger Breaches**: None (Cumulative losses below all enhancement step-up thresholds)  

#### **Key Dates**  
- **Next Payment Date**: 21/07/2025  
- **Clean-Up Call Expected**: May 2028 (if pool balance <10% of initial)  

#### **Liquidity & Structure**  
- **Swap Counterparty**: Mizuho Bank Ltd. (A rating)  
- **Servicer**: Volkswagen Financial Services Australia (remittance condition met)  

---  
**No material operational or capital structure changes identified.**  
(Data as of 31/05/2025; reported 16/06/2025)
